about_the_game:
Landscapes Gallery

This Landscapes-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of beautiful Vistas from around the globe!

Create magnificent landscape scenes in this brand-new DLC.

Contents

The Landscapes gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Beach
  • Cityscape
  • Desert
  • Mountain
  • River
  • European Town
  • Iceberg
  • Jungle
  • Lighthouse
  • The Journey
  • Yorkshire
  • Aurora Borealis
  • Grand Canyon
  • Oasis
  • Sand Dunes
  • Terraced Rice Fields
  • Village
  • Waterfall
  • Wild West
  • Pier
  • Hạ Long Bay

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Landscapes Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Landscapes-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of beautiful Vistas from around the globe! Create magnificent landscape scenes in this brand-new DLC.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
